column4: how can I change my refresh rate? I tried system preferences, but it only shows 85 hz, my monitor supports 100hz
You're going to need to edit your /etc/X11/xorg.conf
preface your messages with the name of the person you're talking to please
ademan: I entered my monitor's horizontal and vertical frequency
I entered my monitor's horizontal and vertical frequency
what graphics card are you using
are you using the NV or nvidia driver?
I just did a fresh install of Edgy
search your xorg.conf for a line that says either Driver "nv" or Driver "nvidia"
you need to use the legacy nvidia driver, not the standard drivers
